excerpt.rendered:
description

A classic look for your traditional home, the Reid Dining Room Collection by Elegance offers an updated country style that will be a warm and inviting addition to your dining space. A cherry finish graces the wood veneers of the group. The rectangular table is supported by substantially appointed double turned leg bases. The tabletop extends to reveal a self-storing table leaf for quick and convenient placement.

product details:

Table:

  • Extended Table size (H30 inches, W42 inches, L 66 inches)
    Width: 3.5 fit
    Length 5.5fit
    Height: 2.5fit
  • Wood effect table with wood effect legs.
  • table top High Gloss finish.

Chair:

  • Includes 6 chairs.
  • Size of each chair H40 inches, W22inches , D22 inches
  • Seat height 20 inches.
  • Solid wood frame with solid wood legs.
  • Fabric seat Juth.
  • Pre Assembled
  • The maximum user weight per chair is 130kg.

“Note: all our products are made to order.”
